sections.title: Verse 1
content: Here we are before You, Lord,
We give our lives as offering,
To serve in love and reverence.

sections.title: Chorus
content: You are the light that guides our way,
We lift our hearts to worship You,

sections.title: Verse 2
content: We are the people of Your grace,
Your hands have formed and fashioned;
Now send us forth to do Your will,
